title: Fnc vs Uol
body: The best LCS game I've ever seen. Just intense all out action from both teams. FNC almost killed the unicorns nexus twice. But the unicorns hung on. 64 kills. Uol had fnc pushed up most of the game, but fnc was winning the important teamfights. I can't even sum it up in one post, it was crazy!

replies.body: low kill games can be jsut as fun, if you can appreciate more strategic plays. (i know not all low kill games have a high strategic value, just as not all high kill games are necessary interesting)

> [{quoted}](name=Risurin,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=sfdTH6BI,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-03-21T00:23:43.451+0000)
>
> low kill games can be jsut as fun, if you can appreciate more strategic plays. (i know not all low kill games have a high strategic value, just as not all high kill games are necessary interesting)

yeah, I think the last mil vs supa hot crew back in Spring 2014 (when both teams were bottom of the standings) was a high kill boring game, can't completely remember though

> [{quoted}](name=Smart Kitty,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=sfdTH6BI,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-03-21T00:45:14.069+0000)
>
> yeah, I think the last mil vs supa hot crew back in Spring 2014 (when both teams were bottom of the standings) was a high kill boring game, can't completely remember though

yeah, or for example straight up stomps in general tend to be boring despite the number of kills. Games are interesting when they are close matchups.
Who is ready to see a shit ton of yorick!!!!{{champion:83}}
yep this is a must see if you like watching lcs

One of the most exciting games ever but also the sloppiest. Uol was in a really bad spot when it was just nunu alive. FNC could have played it safe, pushed another inhib, and recalled. Then push the last remaining inhib

challenger mechanics with bronze 5 late game decisions is best type of games. its a shame it only happens like 5% of the time.
but you will have the wannabe analysts come here and say "awfuly poor execution from both teams starting from pick / ban phase. tons of mistakes in the late game just a terrible game overall"

it's ok wannabe analysts, nobody gives a crap about you wanting to watch a 40 minute game with 10 kills and 1 team steamrolling the other.

> [{quoted}](name=WoW 19Twink Mage,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=sfdTH6BI,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-20T19:30:50.480+0000)
> nobody gives a crap about you wanting to watch a 40 minute game with 10 kills and 1 team steamrolling the other.

I second this mighty opinion!

Nah, they enjoyed it just as much as everyone else I'm sure.  They are just telling the truth when it comes to analyzing the game.  I'm sure anyone and everyone would rather have games like these than the usual xD
